title.en: Bubu to Michelle - Ameagari no Tenshi

altTitles.ja: ブブとミシェル～雨上がりの天使～

altTitles.zh: 布布与米歇尔～雨后的天使～

description.en: Fallen angels would fall from heaven on Sunday mornings. Most of them were dead by the time they reached the ground. The carcasses of fallen angels were a precious food for the poor. One day, a young boy named Michel, who was scavenging the corpses of fallen angels, found an "egg" in the corpse of a fallen angel and brought it home. And a fallen angel was born. What is the future that the two, who met through a prank of fate, will choose?!

altTitles.th: ดาร์วินส์ เกม

description.en:
High school student Kaname Sudou receives an invitation from a classmate to play Darwin’s Game, a mobile game he has never heard of. However, as soon as he opens the application, a green snake suddenly pops out from his phone screen and bites his neck, leaving him unconscious. Waking up in the infirmary without any signs of a snake bite, he is told by the school to take the rest of the day off. Although he is puzzled by what has happened, he dismisses the surreal experience as a hallucination and boards the train home.  
Unfortunately, his curiosity gets the better of him and he uses the application once again. As the application appears to be just like any other battle game, Kaname breathes out a sigh of relief and decides to start his first match. However, the pleasant surprise is short-lived, as his in-game opponent unexpectedly appears right in front of him and attempts to hunt him down with a knife.  
As he desperately runs for his life, Kaname puts two and two together and realizes that Darwin’s Game is not an ordinary game, but rather, it’s a brutal fight for survival.

altTitles.th: ลูเซีย เจ้าหญิงผู้ถูกลืม

description.en:
Lucia grew up not knowing she was a princess. But when her mother died, she entered the palace and had the chance to see her entire future in a dream. In her dream, when she reached 19 years old, she was auctioned off to the bidder who offered the highest dowry. Her life became miserable from then on. When she woke up from her dream, she was determined to reshape her future, realizing that she had plenty of time before the crucial turning point. Thus, she begins her journey to change her dark future.

---
**Note:** *The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.*

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A3%A8%EC%8B%9C%EC%95%84/2616), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52638309)

description.es:
Lucía creció sin saber que era ser una princesa. Pero cuando su Madre murió, ella entró en el palacio y tuvo la oportunidad de ver todo su futuro en un sueño. En su sueño, cuando tenía 19 años, la subastaron al licitador que ofreció la dote más alta. Su vida se volvió miserable a partir de ese momento. Cuando se despertó de su sueño, estaba decidida a cambiar su futuro, al darse cuenta de que tenía mucho tiempo antes del momento crucial. Así, comienza su viaje para cambiar su oscuro futuro.

---
**Note:** *The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.*

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A3%A8%EC%8B%9C%EC%95%84/2616), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52638309)

description.fr:
Elle est la seizième princesse du royaume. Elle vit recluse et oubliée de tous. Un rêve va tout changer. Pour échapper à l’effroyable destin qui la guette, elle est prête à confier sa vie au plus terrible des lions.

---
Lucia, jeune fille de 16 ans et princesse du royaume, a vu son futur à travers un rêve étrange. Mais c'était un cauchemar bien réel d'un mariage qui continue de la hanter. Pour changer son atroce destin, elle se propose en mariage au Duc Hugo Taran, un coureur de jupon très célèbre. Cela pourra-t-il briser le destin funeste de Lucia? Ce choix la mènera-t-elle vers un destin totalement inattendu?

---
**Note:** *The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.*

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A3%A8%EC%8B%9C%EC%95%84/2616), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52638309)

description.th:
ลูเซีย หรือ วิเวียน เฮสเซ เจ้าหญิงผู้ไร้ตัวตนและไม่มีใครสนใจ นางสามารถเห็นอนาคตผ่านความฝันของตัวเองได้ และเมื่อนางรู้ว่าสักวันนางจะถูกขายให้แก่เคาต์ผู้มักมาก นางจึงหาวิธีที่จะเปลี่ยนชะตาชีวิตของตัวเอง และวิธีนั้นก็จำเป็นต้องได้ความช่วยเหลือจากดยุกฮิวโก้ ทารัน ดยุกผู้เลือดเย็นเท่านั้น!

description.zh:
露西亚是王国最没存在感的第十六位公主，通过梦境她预知了自己的未来，梦里的婚姻生活简直惨不忍睹。为了改变自己的悲惨人生，她大胆地向休戈·塔兰公爵提出了契约结婚的请求，他可是王国里出了名的花花公子！两人的婚约真的能够顺利进行吗？

---
**Note:** *The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.*

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A3%A8%EC%8B%9C%EC%95%84/2616), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52638309)

description.pt-br:
Lucia, a décima sexta princesa do reino, viu seu futuro através de um sonho estranho.  
Mas foi um pesadelo vívido de um casamento terrível que continua a assombrá-la.
Para mudar seu destino terrível, ela sugere um contrato de casamento com o duque Hugo Taran, um mulherengo conhecido.
Este plano poderia afastar Lucia de seu destino? Ou será que a sua escolha levará a um caminho que nem ela poderia prever?!
Baseado no romance de sucesso.

---
**Note:** *The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.*

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A3%A8%EC%8B%9C%EC%95%84/2616), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52638309)

【建議15歲以上閱讀】透過夢境預見未來的露西亞，其實是個帝國的第十六王女。夢中那可怕的婚姻生活非常鮮明…為了改變自己的人生，她向擁有「戰場上的黑獅」之稱的塔蘭公爵提出契約婚姻的提議，而塔蘭公爵究竟會不會答應這門婚事呢…？

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

Based on the 2D fighting game series King of Fighters. King of Fighters is a battle between the strongest teams in the world, the teams are composed of 4 since the King of Fighters'99 tournament, also the hero since KoF'99 has changed to K'. The story follows K' starting from 9 months after KoF'99 and his entry into the King of Fighters 2000 tournament.

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Lu Meihe, the art team leader who is called "Cobra" by her subordinates, is a person with a strict appearance and a pure heart. She has a crush on Lin Wenjing, an intern in the group, but due to her image and personality, she cannot express her friendship naturally, so she can only pin her emotions on the sketchbook she carries with her. In an accident, the secret of the sketchbook was discovered by the person concerned. Only then did Lu Meihe know that Lin Wenjing, who seemed gentle and easy-going, seemed to be not a quiet queen... I was bullied by the junior again today, so happy, what should I do?
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

title.en: A Senpai and A Kouhai Who Are Not Dating

altTitles.ja: 付き合っていない先輩と後輩

altTitles.fa: من یک قطعه درجه اسطوره ای بدست آوردم

description.en:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
description.ko:
D급 무투계 레이더,
최강의 귀속 아이템으로
세계를 구할 신의 대적자가 되다!
description.ru: Я получил единственный в мире мифический предмет. Но что? Этот предмет принадлежит мне?

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

description.en:
Ye-jin, who has persistently studied in a challenging environment to gain admission to a prestigious university but has a score of 0 in dating. She tries various things with the hope of finding a boyfriend...

Just when Ye-jin's only male friend and a physical education major, Hyeon, who is wearing the mask of friendship, appears in front of her and gradually becomes obsessed with her.

Can Ye-jin achieve both her dream of raising her family through her high education and her dream of dating while pursuing her education?

title.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.ja-ro: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Kouei: Meikyuukoku no Shinjin Tansakusha

altTitles.fr: L'arrière-garde la plus forte du monde - L'explorateur novice du pays du labyrinthe

altTitles.en: World Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country and Dungeon Seekers
World's Strongest Rearguard - The Novice Seeker of Labyrinth Country

altTitles.ru: Самый сильный в мире Заступник – Страна лабиринта и искатели приключений

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の後衛 ～迷宮国の新人探索者～

altTitles.zh-hk: 世界最強後衛～迷宮國的新人探索者～

altTitles.en: The World's Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country's Novice Seeker

altTitles.zh: 世界最强后卫~迷宫国的新人探索者~

description.en:
Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident, and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager, Igarashi Kyouka, who further explains their role in this world. 


In Labyrinth Country, Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again, but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her. 

And thus starts Arihito's adventure as a "Rear Guard".
description.ru:
Главный герой — трудоголик с большим стажем, он и его босс попадают в аварию, после чего они обнаруживают, что переместились в другой мир. Главный герой не хочет оставаться с начальницей, решая отправиться на приключения в одиночестве. Куда же его приведут эти странствия и встретятся ли они вновь?..   


---

**Links:** [Alternate Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF00000068010000_68/)

description.en:
When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
description.es-la: Juntos o se hunden juntos, ¿se descubrirán mentiras sobre el amor? Están ligados por negocios, fingiendo ser pareja para contrarrestar los escándalos del escritor y lograr ser el primer lugar en el buscador.

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

description.en: Shinichi and Ichigo, who are childhood friends among their neighbors, are first-year high school students in the middle of their youth. There was a longing person who had a feeling for each of them! They couldn't get close to each other just by looking at their favorite person from a distance, but one day in early summer, a bitter gourd-related incident changed their daily lives.
description.ru: Шиничи и Ичиго - первокурсники старшей школы и друзья детства, которые живут по соседству. Каждый из них влюблен в другого человека, но они не могут даже приблизиться к тем, кто им нравится и лишь смотрят на них со стороны. Однако в начале лета их повседневную жизнь сильно изменяет случай с горькой момордикой.
description.pt-br: Shinichi e Ichigo, que além de vizinhos e amigos de infância, são estudantes do primeiro ano do ensino médio em plena juventude. E cada um deles está apaixonado por um pessoa diferente! Mas eles não podem se aproximar da pessoa que gostam e apenas ficam olhando de longe. Porém, num dia no início do verão, um incidente com um pepino causou uma grande mudança em suas vidas diárias.

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé! The curtain raises on a romantic comedy of intertwined fates that begins with being switched at birth!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

altTitles.ja: ヒモクズ花くんは死にたがり

altTitles.en: Deadbeat Hana-kun Has a Death Wish

altTitles.zh-hk: 軟飯人渣小花想要去死

altTitles.zh: 软饭人渣小花想要去死

altTitles.vi: Hana-Kun Không Thể Sống Thiếu Tôi

description.en: Yoshino is a second-year working adult who is exhausted from her daily life and work. One of the worst days of her life, Yoshino gets drunk and wakes up the next morning to find a mysterious boy named Hana-kun sleeping next to her. Yoshino ends up living with Hana-kun for a limited time, and surprisingly begins to feel comfortable living with Hana-kun. Meanwhile, due to a certain incident, Hana-kun becomes obsessed with her for some reason... A love-filled scum boy meets a deeply affectionate company girl, and a love like a powerful drug begins!?
description.ja: 日々の生活と仕事に疲れ切っている社会人2年目の吉野（よしの）。人生最悪のある日泥酔した吉野が翌朝目覚めると、となりに寝ていたのは謎めいた男子「花くん」だった。 期間限定で一緒に暮らすことになり、意外にも花くんとの生活に居心地の良さを覚えていく吉野。そんな中、ある事件をきっかけに花くんになぜか執着されることになって… 愛の重いクズ男子×情の深い社畜女子、劇薬みたいな恋がはじまる⁉

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.
description.es-la:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

Top actress Lee Sia has the ability to see ghosts.
After an accident, she wakes up in the body of 'Camilla Sorfelle'.

But here's the problem.

"Oh, Father, help me!"

This woman's fate always ends in death!

I need to extend my life, so might as well talk to the ghosts first.

Ugh, but why do I keep getting involved with people I want to avoid!?

Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

While trailing someone, the poor detective Sousuke Kaburagi runs into Sara, an imperial princess from another world who uses black magic. Sousuke and Sara gradually begin living together, but in the blink of an eye, Sara becomes accustomed to modern-day Japan...

Meanwhile, Livia—a female knight who transferred to the world after Sara, is enjoying a surprisingly pleasant life, even though she is homeless. The two otherworldly individuals who live a pleasant and strong life influence Sousuke and the other oddballs who live here, such as a devilish lawyer, a divorce agent, and a cult leader. 

---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453038)
description.ja:
異世界の皇女、岐阜で無双！？

貧乏探偵・鏑矢惣助は、尾行中に天から降ってきた金髪の美少女・サラに遭遇。
彼女は自身を異世界の皇女だと言い、とんでもない魔術を披露する。
なし崩し的に惣助の家に居候することになったサラは、
なぜか探偵の仕事に興味を持ちはじめ…？
サラの従者である女騎士・リヴィアをはじめ、変わり者たちが続々登場！
岐阜を舞台に贈る、天下無双の群像喜劇！！

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: 駆け出し勇者とカンスト姫

altTitles.th: หนุ่มเอ๊าะ สะเดาะล็อค

description.en: Yataro Sarumaru, nicknamed Saru, is an ace in the locksmith trade and is obsessed with girls. This (almost) average teenager is given a hardly ordinary mission which marks the beginning of his adventures!
description.it: Due sono le caratteristiche di Yataro Sarumaru, detto Saru ("scimmia"): nessuna serratura può resistergli e lui non può resistere a nessuna donna! A questo teenager (quasi) nella norma, viene affidata una missione straordinaria, che segnerà l'inizio delle sue avventure!

title.en: Shiotaiou no Sato-san ga Ore ni dake Amai

altTitles.ja: 塩対応の佐藤さんが俺にだけ甘い

altTitles.en: Aren’t You Too Sweet Salt-God Sato-San?
The Salt-God Sato-san is only sweet to me!

altTitles.zh: 冷淡的佐藤同學只對我撒嬌

altTitles.th: คุณซาโต้ยอดนักเมิน เธอหวานใส่ผมแค่คนเดียว

description.en:
Satou-san is the unattainable flower of the class. She is always cold and curt with classmates, but only I know she's actually very cute when she smiles, even if she's not much of a photographer.  
Oshio-kun is friendly and lively, but only I know he works at his family's cafe after school. He does a great job with the cafe's SNS account, and his mischievous smile makes my heart skip a beat!  
Innocent and sweet, but sometimes frustrating, this is a 120%-pure fluffy story about two people falling in love for the first time.
description.ja:
こんなに甘い”両片想い”見たことない！

「佐藤さんは高嶺の花で誰に対しても塩対応。でも、意外と隙だらけだって俺だけが知ってる。写真を撮るのが下手。そのくせドヤ顔しがち。そして、へにゃっと笑う顔がすごく可愛い」

「押尾君は誰に対しても優しい。でも、意外といじわるなところもあるって私だけが知ってる。SNSを使うのが上手。オシャレなカフェの店員さん。そして、悪戯っぽく笑う顔にすごくドキドキする」

――これは内緒だけど、俺（私）はそんな彼女（彼）のことが好きだ。

初々しくて、もどかしい二人の初恋。尊さ＆糖度120％！
description.pt-br:
Satou-san é a flor inatingível da classe.  Ela é sempre fria e ríspida com os colegas de classe, mas só eu sei que ela é realmente muito fofa quando sorri, mesmo que ela não seja muito fotogênica.
  
Oshio-kun é amigável e animado, mas só eu sei que ele trabalha no café de sua família depois da escola.  Ele faz um ótimo trabalho com a conta da internet do café, e seu sorriso malicioso faz meu coração bater mais forte!
  
 Inocente e doce, mas às vezes frustrante, esta é uma história fofa 120% pura sobre duas pessoas se apaixonando pela primeira vez.

altTitles.ja: 学園アイドルマスター GOLD RUSH

description.en: The story of girls who attend a school where dreams come true!

title.en: The Villainess Captured the Grand Duke

altTitles.es-la: Capturé el corazón del gran duque siendo una villana

description.en:
In this novel, my favorite character died.
After being rejected by the female lead and losing his emotions, he could no longer use his abilities,
and as he became weak, the North collapsed.
Even his body was never to be found,
but the novel only depicted the happy ending of the protagonists.

And I possessed the body of the villainess "Schuer" from that novel.

"Rather, I'll make him regain his emotions before he meets the female lead."

Thus, I left for the North.

"Grand Duke, can you hold my hand just once?
Or maybe a signature. I'll keep it as a heirloom."
"If you want my signature, you too should sign and stamp here, my Lady."
"What's this?"
"A marriage certificate."

Huh?

"You can just act you usually do.
It seems like your behavior is
is somewhat getting on my nerves."

...Did I win the jackpot?

Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

title.en: Kusunoki's Flunking Her High School Glow-Up

altTitles.ja: 楠木さんは高校デビューに失敗している

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusunoki-san wa Koukou Debut ni Shippai Shite Iru

altTitles.ja: She is (not) a cool girl (in high school)

altTitles.en: Kusunoku-san's Failing Her High School Debut
Kusunoki-san Failed Her High School Debut
Kusunoki-san Failed to Debut in High School

altTitles.zh: 楠木同学高中出道失败了

altTitles.zh-ro: Nánmù tóngxué gāo zhòng chūdào shībàile

altTitles.ru: Кусуноки-сан не смогла измениться к старшей школе

description.en: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past...except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!
description.ja:
中学時代のトラウマをきっかけに高校デビューに成功した元陰キャの志月恵助。
新しい環境で過去の自分を知る者はいない。ただ一人、同じ中学出身で
恵助と同様に高校デビューを果たした女子・楠木静を除いて…。

---
Chūgaku jidai no torauma o kikkake ni kōkō debyū ni seikō shita moto in kya no shitsuki keisuke. Atarashī kankyō de kako no jibun o shiru mono wa inai. Tadahitori, onaji chūgaku shusshin de keisuke to dōyō ni kōkō debyū o hatashita joshi Kusunoki Shizuka o nozoite….
description.pt-br: Depois de seus anos traumáticos no ensino médio, o ultra-introvertido Shizuki Keisuke decide mudar sua vida e se transforma completamente para sua "estreia" no ensino médio. Sua nova vida escolar parece promissora, já que ninguém sabe de seu passado oculto... exceto por uma pessoa: Kusunoki Shizuka, que também mudou a si mesma em busca de uma vida escolar mais bem-sucedida! À medida que seus destinos se entrelaçam, Keisuke será capaz de viver uma vida pacífica no ensino médio...?!

altTitles.ja: ガンダムエグザ　ブイエス

description.en:
Gundam EXA VS (ガンダム EXA VS) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2014 to be tied in with the arcade Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Maxi Boost. It's the sequel to the previous manga series, Gundam EXA.

Some time after the events of Gundam EXA, Sthesia Awar informs Leos Alloy that she discovered a new GA data cluster from a computer outside of Jupiter X. The two dive into the new data and find themselves in the Universal Century, during the attack on Side 7. However, after entering the colony, they find that the inside was in ruins, and the RX-78-02 Gundam has been destroyed before it could be activated by Amuro Ray.

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.es-la: Estoy preocupado por mi novia que solía estar cubierta de moretones

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).
description.es-la: Continuación de [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

description.en:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.

altTitles.en: The story about my office noona

description.en:
Ahn was a mature and attractive older woman I met through my company's task force. Wise and caring, that's how I became captivated with her… However, she was also a woman with a child.  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nianshangjiejiedeyouhuo/list?title_no=1562)

Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?

description.en:
A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! However, that special ability is not used to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all one's might! A unique story of conquering another world begins here!

The protagonist, “Sao” has been reborn with his memories from his past life. He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. With the class “Rod Master,” he received as he grows up, and the many skills that came up with it, he can defeat enemies, help people, and even for sex.
description.id: Seorang pria yang telah bereinkarnasi di dunia lain memperoleh panggilan "master tongkat" di dunia baru!  Namun, kemampuan itu tidak digunakan untuk mengalahkan musuh, atau untuk mendapatkan kekuatan, melainkan untuk ngentot dengan gadis-gadis cantik yang terus muncul!
description.ja: ノクターンノベルズ大人気作！ 異世界転生したとある男は新天地で「竿師」なる天職を手にする！ だが、その異能は敵を倒すためでもなく、権力を手にするためでもなく、ただひたすらに全力で次々と現れる美少女を抱くことに使うのだ！ 異色の異世界制覇譚、ここに開幕！

altTitles.ja: わざと見せてる? 加茂井さん。

altTitles.en: Are You Showing It on Purpose?

description.en: Sudo, is an unassuming second-year junior high boy, who likes to draw. Kamoi-san, his classmate, is a JC in a short skirt who stands out everywhere she goes! These are the days between a flamboyant gal and an ordinary boy.
description.fr:
On suit l'histoire de Sutô, un jeune étudiant en seconde année du lycée plutôt banal voire transparent, mais qui a un passion pour les mangas et sait dessiner. Kamoi, la gyarû de sa classe, elle-même fan de manga, remarque les qualités de dessinateur de Sutô. 
S'installe entre eux une relation d'amitié, voir...
description.ja: 中学２年生の加茂井さんは、クラスに一人はいたようでいなかった、でもやっぱりいたＪＣギャル！　そんなクラスでも目立つ加茂井さんと、存在感のない地味な僕の物語。

altTitles.en: The Day You Came Falling Down

altTitles.th: วันที่เธอร่วงหล่นลงมา

description.en: The story of the Devil who picked up an Angel's child.
description.es: Un demonio descansaba en el bosque, cuando de repente algo cae del cielo, resultó ser un bebé con alas, ¡un ángel!. El demonio decide hacerce cargo del ángelito para engordarlo y luego comérselo, pero las cosas no resultan de esa manera, descubre que pasa con estos dos.

altTitles.en: The Struggle of a 0 Love Flag Girl

description.en: She’s man thuuuursty but, oh, so unlucky. Came to an island village full of handsome boys and men, but over here, love can only be fulfilled If you got a dick (x dick). Will our man thirsty heroine with aspiration to be the most popular slut ( her own words, not mine) break the village’s gay love curse and find true love? Read to find out.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.en: I'll Become a Villainess Who Goes Down in History: It Seems Turning into a High-Born Baddie Makes the Prince All the More Lovestruck

altTitles.zh: 成为名垂青史的恶役千金吧！
成为名垂青史的恶役千金吧！少女越坏王子越爱！

altTitles.id: Aku Akan Menjadi Seorang Villainess Yang Akan Dikenang Dalam Sejarah

altTitles.ja-ro: Rekishi ni Nokoru Akujo ni naru zo

altTitles.en: I'll Become a Villainess That Will Go Down in History: The More Villainous I Become, the More the Prince Dotes on Me
I'll Become a Villainess Who Will Go Down in History: The More Villainous I Become, the More the Prince Dotes on Me

description.en:
"I don't want a world full of only pretty things! I'll become a villainess who will go down in history!!"

For someone who hates a typical "good girl" heroine, I was reincarnated as my favorite otome-game villainess! Since my wish has been granted, I'll be the number one villainess who will go down in history! For that to happen, I need to be strong and intelligent! Also, although I'm just... doing my best, the more of a villainess I become, the more I'm liked by the Prince?! Can I really go down in history―?!
description.id:
"Aku tidak butuh dunia yang dipenuhi oleh keindahan! Yang kuinginkan hanyalah menjadi seorang villainess yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!!".
Sebagai seseorang yang sangat membeci tipikal heroine yang "baik hati", Aku telah bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang villainess didalam game otome favoritku!, karena keinginanku telah terkabulkan, maka aku akan berusaha untuk menjadi seorang villainess nomer satu yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!.
Agar hal itu bisa terjadi, maka aku haruslah kuat dan juga cerdas!
Tapi walau aku sudah berusaha keras untuk menjadi vilainess yang kuinginkan... Entah kenapa sang pangeran malah semakin tertarik kepadaku?! Kira-kira bisa tidak ya aku menjadi seorang villainess yang dikenang dalam sejarah....

title.en: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Savage: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.ja: 野人転生: KARATE SURVIVOR IN ANOTHER WORLD

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
description.ja: 姓名と風貌から、「野人」と呼ばれている野崎人志は、ひょんなことから異世界に転生させられる。
description.es-la: Nozaki Hitoshi, conocido como el "Hombre Salvaje" por su apellido y apariencia, se reencarna accidentalmente en otro mundo.

title.en: I Like How You Hate Me but Can't Get Rid of Me

altTitles.zh: Jiu Xi Huan Ni Kan Bu Guan Wo You Gan Bu Diao Wo De Yang Zi
就喜欢你看不惯我又干不掉我的样子

description.en: A house cat with a superiority complex.

Ichiru Kanzaki is given an offer he can't refuse: to clear his entire debt, he has to enroll in the high school his father works at and track down his father's illegitimate daughter, whom he has never met. But which girl is she?

Esper Academy’s Class President elections are underway! Who will come out on top? Hazama, a regal girl born with psychic powers, Taiyo, a brash boy who developed them later, or… love?

Golden Future Cup Oneshot #2 2024
